name: CopyCat | HTML, react component code generator | Export color, icons, font, image
description:
Auto-convert your Figma designs to React.js code that works. It is even compatible with existing codebase! CopyCat will help you build UI faster than anybody else.


Do You...

...face sprint delays and design inconsistencies while developing UI?

...find yourself doing a lot of tedious, redundant work?

...feel dissatisfaction with your job?

And are you looking for intelligent ways to develop UI quickly?


Your Solution

You can build UI faster than your competition with CopyCat. Just copy production-ready code generated directly from Figma designs using AI. As a result, you can focus on building interactions, animations, networking and everything else that will make you stand out. You can be an exceptional front end developer who develops UI quickly using CopyCat.


Devs in the fastest growing companies in the world use CopyCat: Amazon, JP Morgan, Walmart, and more.


We know what it's like to do redundant work. Our goal is to help you avoid development rework that leads to delivery delays. Let us help you find efficient ways to write quality code.


Get Started For Free

Steps to start building faster:

  1. Install the Figma plugin and sign up with your Figma account
  2. Open CopyCat plugin on your design
  3. Copy generated code to your code editor

You'll be 2X faster at developing UI. You'll meet your deadlines and spend your time solving exciting challenges, too! Best of all, you'll eliminate sprint delays and design inconsistencies.


More Resources For You


Read the documentation:

You wouldn't build furniture without reading the instructions first, right? Take a couple of minutes to read how to fully and effectively use CopyCat to your advantage, and you'll never have to reread it. Read here:


Join CopyCats: https://copycatdev.notion.site/Documentation-live-3ff9652da99d4603bf7ab6f18c72e564

The more, the merrier! CopyCats is a discord community of React.js developers who are helping each other become more productive with CopyCat. Talk with other developers, network with like-minded developers you can't meet anywhere else, and discover opportunities in the React.js ecosystem. We also provide priority support there. Connect and build faster now: https://discord.com/invite/RHME3ncq


Benefits of being a CopyCat:


You'll get: an extended free trial for the CopyCat Individual plan, exclusive community swag, access to resources, tools, learning tutorials, coding tutorials, coding tips, coding snippets and more.


Languages supported:

Currently, we only support React.js for web development.
